eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Missouri; AT 09:18 PM ON OCT 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:18 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THE FOLLOWING IS A STATE-WIDE MONTHLY TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM, ORIGINATING FROM THE MISSOURI STATE HIGHWAY PATROL IN JEFFERSON CITY AND COORDINATED WITH THE LOCAL BROADCASTERS IN YOUR COMMUNITY. THIS IS ONLY A TEST.
